ygData.subject: Re: Yay friends rock
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool, Christina. Glad it went so well. I ve been tempted to come out to female characters I ve known, but you never know for sure if the person behind the
ygData.messageBody:
Cool, Christina. Glad it went so well.

I've been tempted to come out to female characters I've known, but you never know
for sure if the person behind the character is a female or a male, and it's been
my experience that women are more mature about such things than men (or rather the
14 year old boys who play EQ).

She sounds like the kind of person we'd like to have in our guild. Hope things
continue to go smoothly there.
